item.title: Supplier Risk Management Plan for SecureCam
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482397296769{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="2439"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482397327069{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights
" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESecureCam%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESecurity%20Global%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EVulnerability%20%26%20Threat%20Management%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Many organizations forget to include their vendors in risk management plan while developing IT Security. Supplier or vendor risk management plan is very important in developing efficient and complete IT Security. Why is that? Your vendors, intentionally or unintentionally can become source of security threat.
This is why it is of vital importance to look at your company as a whole while developing risk management plan. That means you need to take your vendors and employees into account as a possible intentional or unintentional source of IT Security vulnerability or a threat and create a plan that will address those vulnerabilities or threats and deal with them in appropriate way.
ConsultingPress provided complete service of Risk Management Plan creation and management for SecureCam company in New York USA. SecureCam is an IT company that produces and sells IP cameras and stores surveillance footages for it's clients.
ConsultingPress helped to assure IT Security in SecureCam is on highest level.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Vulnerabilities%20and%20Threats%20Detection%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Analysis%20of%20Business%20Relationships%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20analysis%20of%20SecureCam%20vendors%2C%20it's%20rights%20to%20IT%20assets%20of%20the%20company%2C%20ways%20of%20communication%20and%20information%20transfers.%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Creating%20detailed%20Risk%20Management%20Plan%20for%20SecureCam%5Cn%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Increased%20level%20of%20IT%20Security%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20vendor%20risk%20management%20plan%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Documented%20best%20practices%20and%20procedures%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Higher%20level%20of%20data%20security%5Cn%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Vulnerability Management Case Study for MacroBank

" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMacroBank%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESecurity%20Global%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EEducation%20%26%20Security%20Awareness%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Many organizations forget to include their vendors in risk management plan while developing IT Security. Supplier or vendor risk management plan is very important in developing efficient and complete IT Security. Why is that? Your vendors, intentionally or unintentionally can become source of security threat.
This is why it is of vital importance to look at your company as a whole while developing risk management plan. That means you need to take your vendors and employees into account as a possible intentional or unintentional source of IT Security vulnerability or a threat and create a plan that will address those vulnerabilities or threats and deal with them in appropriate way.
ConsultingPress provided complete service of Risk Management Plan creation and management for MacroBank company in New York USA.
ConsultingPress helped to assure IT Security in MacroBank is on highest level and educate employees and business partners of value and importance of IT Security.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Vulnerabilities%20and%20Threats%20Detection%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Analysis%20of%20Business%20Relationships%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20analysis%20of%20Avia%20vendors%2C%20it's%20rights%20to%20IT%20assets%20of%20the%20company%2C%20ways%20of%20communication%20and%20information%20transfers.%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Creating%20detailed%20Risk%20Management%20Plan%20for%20MacroBank%5Cn%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Increased%20level%20of%20IT%20Security%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20vendor%20risk%20management%20plan%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Documented%20best%20practices%20and%20procedures%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Higher%20level%20IT%20Security%20awareness%5Cn%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.dc:creator: admin

Supplier or vendor risk management plan is very important in developing efficient and complete IT Security. Why is that? Your vendors, intentionally or unintentionally can become source of security threat.
This is why it is of vital importance to look at your company as a whole while developing risk management plan. That means you need to take your vendors and employees into account as a possible intentional or unintentional source of IT Security vulnerability or a threat and create a plan that will address those vulnerabilities or threats and deal with them in appropriate way.
ConsultingPress provided complete service of Risk Management Plan creation and management for Avia company in New York USA. Avia is an IT company that produces and sells IP cameras and stores surveillance footages for it's clients.
ConsultingPress helped to assure IT Security in Avia is on highest level and educate employees and business partners of value and importance of IT Security.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Vulnerabilities%20and%20Threats%20Detection%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Analysis%20of%20Business%20Relationships%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20analysis%20of%20Avia%20vendors%2C%20it's%20rights%20to%20IT%20assets%20of%20the%20company%2C%20ways%20of%20communication%20and%20information%20transfers.%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Creating%20detailed%20Risk%20Management%20Plan%20for%20Avia%5Cn%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Increased%20level%20of%20IT%20Security%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20vendor%20risk%20management%20plan%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Documented%20best%20practices%20and%20procedures%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Higher%20level%20IT%20Security%20awareness%5Cn%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Security Awareness Training in Media8 & Co
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482397296769{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="2472"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482397327069{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights
" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESupralo%20Ltd.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMedia8%20%26%20Co%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EEducation%20%26%20Security%20Awareness%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]People are the most important and valuable asset in any company. On the other hand they can be the most critical link in your IT Security chain. Why is that? First of all people can be IT Security threats, intentional or unintentional. Unintentional insider threats are most common and the least researched and addressed IT Security Threats.
Today IT Security attackers focus mostly on people, using Social Engineering and similar methods. Why? Because in large numbers of companies IT Security is on the lowest level of priority when comes to company investments. Very few companies invest in IT Security and raise awareness and IT Security education among their employees. This is what attackers know well and what they exploit the most. So how to protect yourself? Education and Security Awareness programs and training for both your employees and your vendors can help a lot.
ConsultingPress provided complete service of Security Awareness Training for Media8 & Co. which helped in raising awareness of importance of IT Security and role of an employee in the whole picture.
ConsultingPress helped to assure IT Security in Media8 & Co. is on highest level and educate employees and business partners of value and importance of IT Security.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Vulnerabilities%20and%20Threats%20Detection%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Analysis%20of%20Business%20Relationships%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20analysis%20of%20Media8%20%26%20Co.%20vendors%2C%20it's%20rights%20to%20IT%20assets%20of%20the%20company%2C%20ways%20of%20communication%20and%20information%20transfers.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22IT%20Security%20Architecture%20%26%20Implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Increased%20level%20of%20IT%20Security%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20vendor%20risk%20management%20plan%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Documented%20best%20practices%20and%20procedures%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Higher%20level%20IT%20Security%20awareness%5Cn%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

On the other hand they can be the most critical link in your IT Security chain. Why is that? First of all people can be IT Security threats, intentional or unintentional. So how to protect yourself? Education and Security Awareness programs and training for both your employees and your vendors can help a lot.
ConsultingPress provided complete service of Security Awareness Training for Pyrodos Ltd. which helped in raising awareness of importance of IT Security and role of an employee in the whole picture.
ConsultingPress helped to assure IT Security in Pyrodos Ltd. is on highest level and educate employees and business partners of value and importance of IT Security.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Vulnerabilities%20and%20Threats%20Detection%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Analysis%20of%20Business%20Relationships%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20analysis%20of%20Pyrodos%20Ltd.%20vendors%2C%20it's%20rights%20to%20IT%20assets%20of%20the%20company%2C%20ways%20of%20communication%20and%20information%20transfers.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22IT%20Security%20Architecture%20%26%20Implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Increased%20level%20of%20IT%20Security%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20vendor%20risk%20management%20plan%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Documented%20best%20practices%20and%20procedures%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Higher%20level%20IT%20Security%20awareness%5Cn%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: IT Security Architecture & Implementation in Crollen & Co.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482397296769{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="2496"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482397327069{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights
" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ECrollen%20%26%20Co%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESecurity%20Global%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EArchitecture%20%26%20Implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Building IT Security architecture is complex tax. Our expert IT Security consultants will guide you through every step of creating efficient IT Security environment in your company. We will analyze your business processes and functions, address threats and vulnerabilities your company face and discover your most critical assets that needs highest priority protection.
This is why it is of vital importance to look at your company as a whole while creating and implementing IT Security. That means you need to take your vendors and employees into account as a possible intentional or unintentional source of IT Security vulnerability or a threat and create a plan that will address those vulnerabilities or threats and deal with them in appropriate way.
ConsultingPress provided complete service of IT Security Architecture and Implementation for Crollen & Co company in New York USA.
ConsultingPress helped to assure IT Security in Crollen & Co is on highest level and educate employees and business partners of value and importance of IT Security.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Vulnerabilities%20and%20Threats%20Detection%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Analysis%20of%20Business%20Relationships%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20analysis%20of%20Crollen%20vendors%2C%20it's%20rights%20to%20IT%20assets%20of%20the%20company%2C%20ways%20of%20communication%20and%20information%20transfers.%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22IT%20Security%20Architecture%20%26%20Implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Increased%20level%20of%20IT%20Security%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20vendor%20risk%20management%20plan%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Documented%20best%20practices%20and%20procedures%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Higher%20level%20IT%20Security%20awareness%5Cn%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Implementing Fingerprint Check in Falcon Logistics
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482397296769{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="2507"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482397327069{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights
" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EFalcon%20Logistics.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMedia8%20%26%20Co%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EArchitecture%20%26%20Implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Falcon Logistics is a transportation and logistics company from Canada. Their level of IT Security was on a pretty decent level, however the physical layer of IT Security in some departments was not implemented fully. As the most critical assets are handling by outside vendors and partners that needs access to their warehouses, ConsultingPress decided to implement fingerprint scanners on every critical point of asset handling.
Fingerprint checks are not new method but are pretty practical and secure when used with some other biometrics procedures. As most critical company assets are placed in warehouses, to which every vendor has access, ConsultingPress implemented fingerprint check in every entrance to warehouses complex and in every warehouse separately including custom ID cards for every vendor employees as a second way of identity check.
ConsultingPress provided complete service of IT Security physical level implementation for most critical company assets.
ConsultingPress helped to assure IT Security in Falcon Logistics. is on highest level and educate employees and business partners of value and importance of IT Security.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Vulnerabilities%20and%20Threats%20Detection%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Analysis%20of%20Business%20Relationships%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20analysis%20of%20Falcon%20Logistics%20vendors%2C%20it's%20rights%20to%20IT%20assets%20of%20the%20company%2C%20ways%20of%20communication%20and%20information%20transfers.%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22IT%20Security%20Architecture%20%26%20Implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Increased%20level%20of%20IT%20Security%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20vendor%20risk%20management%20plan%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Documented%20best%20practices%20and%20procedures%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Higher%20level%20IT%20Security%20awareness%5Cn%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Security Incident Management Program for Supralo Ltd.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482397296769{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="2514"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482397327069{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights
" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESupralo%20Ltd.%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESecurity%20Global%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EArchitecture%20%26%20Implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Dealing with IT Security incidents can be difficult, time and money consuming process. ConsultingPress helps companies in providing detailed procedures for dealing with and mitigating security incidents. We provided detailed procedures for security incident management to our clients, Supralo Ltd., which resulted in faster reaction to IT Security incidents and it's proper management.
When creating any level of IT Security you need to look at your company as a whole, decide which assets are of critical, vital importance for your company, and here we mean on all assets, including people. You need to have detailed plan and procedures on what needs to be done if some sort of security incident happens.
ConsultingPress provided complete service of Security Incident Program creation for Supralo Ltd., company from New York USA.
ConsultingPress helped to assure IT Security in Supralo Ltd. is on highest level and educate employees and business partners of value and importance of IT Security.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Vulnerabilities%20and%20Threats%20Detection%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Analysis%20of%20Business%20Relationships%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20analysis%20of%20Supralo%20Ltd.%20vendors%2C%20it's%20rights%20to%20IT%20assets%20of%20the%20company%2C%20ways%20of%20communication%20and%20information%20transfers.%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22IT%20Security%20Architecture%20%26%20Implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Increased%20level%20of%20IT%20Security%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20vendor%20risk%20management%20plan%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Documented%20best%20practices%20and%20procedures%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Higher%20level%20IT%20Security%20awareness%5Cn%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482397296769{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="2532"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482397327069{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights
" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EEnescent%20Global%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMedia8%20%26%20Co%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESecurity%20Incident%20Management%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Dealing with IT Security incidents can be difficult, time and money consuming process. ConsultingPress helps companies in providing detailed procedures for dealing with and mitigating security incidents. We provided detailed procedures for security incident management to our clients, Supralo Ltd., which resulted in faster reaction to IT Security incidents and it's proper management.
When creating any level of IT Security you need to look at your company as a whole, decide which assets are of critical, vital importance for your company, and here we mean on all assets, including people. You need to have detailed plan and procedures on what needs to be done if some sort of security incident happens.
ConsultingPress provided complete service of Security Incident Program creation for Enescent Global, company from New York USA.
ConsultingPress helped to assure IT Security in Enescent Global is on highest level and educate employees and business partners of value and importance of IT Security.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Vulnerabilities%20and%20Threats%20Detection%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Analysis%20of%20Business%20Relationships%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20analysis%20of%20Enescent%20Global%20vendors%2C%20it's%20rights%20to%20IT%20assets%20of%20the%20company%2C%20ways%20of%20communication%20and%20information%20transfers.%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22IT%20Security%20Architecture%20%26%20Implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Increased%20level%20of%20IT%20Security%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20vendor%20risk%20management%20plan%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Documented%20best%20practices%20and%20procedures%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Higher%20level%20IT%20Security%20awareness%5Cn%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Risk Management Plan for Capive & Co
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482397296769{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_single_image reveal="true" image="2541"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1482397327069{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Highlights
" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EClient%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ECapive%20%26%20Co%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EPartners%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESecurity%20Global%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20duration%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3EMay%202016%20-%20Aug%202016%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22%3Cb%3EProject%20category%3A%20%3C%2Fb%3ESecurity%20Risk%20%26%20Compliance%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Project Overview" title_size="h3"][vc_column_text]Dealing with risk management is one of the most important parts of project manager. ConsultingPress helps companies and project managers in creating highly detailed plan - document containing procedures for risk addressing, estimating impacts on business processes and functions and proper responses to every risk addressed.
Our experts helps you in addressing your most critical assets and secure them. We help you in foreseeing possible risks and their impact on project, business process or function, asset or company as a whole and educate you how to create detailed risk management plan and how to deal with IT Security risks.
ConsultingPress provided complete service of Risk Management Plan creation for Capive & Co.
ConsultingPress helped to assure IT Security in Capive & Co. is on highest level and educate project managers and employees of value and importance of IT Security.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Activities" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Vulnerabilities%20and%20Threats%20Detection%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Analysis%20of%20Business%20Relationships%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20analysis%20of%20Capive%20%26%20Co.%20vendors%2C%20it's%20rights%20to%20IT%20assets%20of%20the%20company%2C%20ways%20of%20communication%20and%20information%20transfers.%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22IT%20Security%20Architecture%20%26%20Implementation%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][volcanno_heading heading_style="custom-heading-03" title="Results" title_size="h3"][volcanno_icon_list param_group_default="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Increased%20level%20of%20IT%20Security%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Detailed%20vendor%20risk%20management%20plan%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Documented%20best%20practices%20and%20procedures%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon_lynny%22%2C%22icon_lynny%22%3A%22lynny-record%22%2C%22text%22%3A%22Higher%20level%20IT%20Security%20awareness%5Cn%22%7D%5D"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
